document_data.name: Ethur Anszim
document_data.mainbody: Ambassador '''Ethur Anszim''' was the representative of the [[Red Wizards of Thay]] at their enclave within the city of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Personality: A witty yet unforgiving man, Ethur was often invited to the parties of Waterdhavian nobles who wish edto appear "daring". In secret, Ethur wished to control the city.
